types.html:
clermontois (feminine clermontoise, masculine plural clermontois, feminine plural clermontoises)

  1. of, from or relating to the city of Clermont-Ferrand, the prefecture of the Puy-de-Dôme department, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France
  2. of, from or relating to the town of Clermont, Oise department, Hauts-de-France, France; Clermont, Ariège department, Occitania; Clermont, Haute-Savoie department, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes; or Clermont, Landes department, Nouvelle-Aquitaine
trans: of, from or relating to the city of Clermont-Ferrand, the prefecture of the Puy-de-Dôme department, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France
of, from or relating to the town of Clermont, Oise department, Hauts-de-France, France
